author: Special Correspondent
text:
Air India has advised passengers to report at the airport three hours prior to departure of flights owing to stringent checking of passengers and their baggage in view of the security alert following the Pathankot attack and upcoming Republic Day celebrations.

However, there will be no change in the closing time of check-in counters and boarding gates, the AI said in a statement.
title: Report 3 hours before flight, says AI advisory
